Professional_headline: AI & Data Science Enthusiast | Full Stack Learner | Creative Problem Solver
Sub_heading: I'm an AI & Data Science student passionate about building real-world projects, productivity tech, and smart systems that make a difference.
Who_I_Am: I'm a dedicated AI & Data Science student with a passion for creating innovative solutions to real-world problems. My journey in technology is driven by curiosity and a desire to build systems that enhance human productivity and creativity.
Currently pursuing my B.E. in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science, I'm constantly expanding my knowledge through hands-on projects, hackathons, and collaborative work.
My_Interests: Participating in hackathons and coding competitions
Exploring the intersection of AI and human creativity

projects.name: ClipHub
projects.description: An end-to-end media platform enabling creators to upload, stream, and organize short video and music content with leaderboards and challenges.

projects.name: NOVA
projects.description: An AI-powered assistant that plans tasks based on mood, energy, and behavior using agentic reasoning and RAG pipelines.

projects.name: Insight Lab
projects.description: A tool that automatically analyzes datasets and generates insights and visualizations to reduce manual data analysis effort.

details: Developed a full-stack battery simulation system with real-time data handling.
